hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Deku Shield#.
